other_tests.findings: Symptomatic foreign bodies in the heart should be removed irrespective of their location.
Bullets were removed from the heart; patients showed prolonged asymptomatic follow-up.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Patients remain alive and well after years.

other_tests.findings: A foreign body (central venous catheter fragment) was effectively removed.
Used in some surgeries that involved the removal of foreign bodies.
